name: World War Robot
description:
The Great War against the robots is going poorly and humanity is fading. In this FPS survival game the front lines are stretched thin and its your job to hold them against endless waves of robot enemies. Collect Robot modules from downed robots that enhance the player and use the maze of trenches to your advantage. Survive as long as possible.

Features:

  • Use the WSAD to move around, shift to sprint, space to jump
  • Click to shoot enemies
  • Scoring system
  • Enemies drop health and speed upgrades
